text: Ivarkal (cati ceyyum tankal kurrattai) manitarkalukku maraikkirarkal. Eninum, (atai) allahvukku maraittuvita mutiyatu. (Allah) virumpata visayankalaikkontu ivarkal iravellam peci cati alocanai ceyyum potu avan avarkalutantan irukkiran. Allah avarkalutaiya (catic) ceyalai(t tan nanattal) culntukontum irukkiran
